Name: Neon Warp
About the game: Neon Warp is a simple yet very unique puzzle game. On each level there are blocks of 3 colors. When you move the frame from a block of one color to a block of another a third color appears. Using this technique your goal is to repaint all blocks into a single color and you need to do it with least amount of turns. Features 150 levels Time trial mode with 10+ levels Full controller support Steam achievements and leaderboards
Meta Title: Neon Warp: Jul 29, 2016, Axel Sonic and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on Neon Warp? Check out the release date (Jul 29, 2016), developer insights from Axel Sonic, and a complete game summary.
